title.narrative: Rwanda Public Finance Management Reform Project

description.narrative: To improve budget reliability and control of funds for service delivery, enhance budget transparency and increase professionalization of the public finance officials.

condition.narrative: Section IV. A. No later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, the Recipient shall have upgraded the IFMIS to, inter alia,prepare consolidated financial reports and annual statements for projects, in form and substance satisfactory to the Association.
